Giuseppe Tornatore's picture captures the essence of the human experience - friendship and love sought, love gained and love lost come full circle. A film every cinephile should see, this movie is a tribute to film-making. The beautiful and evocative score by the legendary Ennio Morricone and his son Andrea fit the movie like a hand to a glove. The international version is a masterpiece; this is a masterpiece restored.
